name: places/ChIJhYG-tqpZwokRAe0xeCsQqPQ
formattedAddress: 115 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 115 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: After 20+ years with this financial institution, we are parting ways.  Let me tell you about my experience with Merrill Lynch, their investment division.  We had two children, and even though we were very poor, we managed to put 25.00 per month in savings accounts for our children.  We moved several times through the years And we forgot about these accounts.  B of A made the decision, to charge huge maintenance fees to the accounts, until the balance was 0.00. When I found the paperwork on these accounts and realized the error, I made an appointment and went to see the local Merrill Lynch advisor.  The very rude advisor,  stated that we would not be able to receive the money for our children.........and maybe if we put more money with Merrill Lynch, a broker might be willing to reverse the fees.  It was our problem, not hers.  She not only lacked compassion, but was very condescending.  This is an appalling way to do business.  I now realize that you are a big company and have no compassion for the people that you make money off of.  You are more interested in the bottom line and keeping shareholders happy.  FYI, we have moved our mortgage loan, we have moved all but a small amount of our savings accounts.  We are also moving all automatic payments to another institution and our checking account will then be gone.  Good by B of A,  after 20+ years we have lost faith and trust in you and your business practices.

originalText.text: This place is a SCAM. DO NOT go here. But if you do make sure you count all your money before you leave. We were told that the fee was only $10. But for some reason I was short $200, my dumb self was in a rush and didn’t count my foreign exchange. When I contacted them they said the $200 was a fee. Then why was I not informed? If I knew about the double fees I won’t ever come here! Seriously Highway robbery!

I opened my bank account at this branch.

They're service and atmosphere was so good.

originalText.text: The staff is so warm and welcoming it felt more like being at a nice hotel than at a bank. I came without an appointment for currency exchange and they still managed to fit me in promptly.

text.text: The staff is so warm and welcoming it felt more like being at a nice hotel than at a bank. I came without an appointment for currency exchange and they still managed to fit me in promptly.

originalText.text: Please I’d like to refund a cashier check which has already been deposited to my account. Any process to go about this or any number to call?
